headline: Why Is Tilray (TLRY) Stock Soaring Today
summary: Shares of cannabis company Tilray Brands (NASDAQ:TLRY) jumped 38.5% in the afternoon session after reports that President Donald Trump is considering reclassifying marijuana as a less dangerous drug, a move that could transform the cannabis industry's regulatory landscape.

headline: Why Monday.com (MNDY) Shares Are Plunging Today
summary: Shares of project management software maker Monday.com (NASDAQ:MNDY) fell 26.5% in the morning session after the company reported second-quarter results that beat analyst estimates but issued a weaker-than-expected revenue outlook for the third quarter. The main concern for investors was the company's third-quarter revenue guidance of $311 million to $313 million. headline: Unlocking Monster Beverage (MNST) International Revenues: Trends, Surprises, and Prospects
summary: Evaluate Monster Beverage's (MNST) reliance on international revenue to better understand the company's financial stability, growth prospects and potential stock price performance.

headline: AAON (NASDAQ:AAON) Reports Sales Below Analyst Estimates In Q2 Earnings, Stock Drops 15.6%
summary: Heating and cooling solutions company AAON (NASDAQ:AAON) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q2 CY2025, with sales flat year on year at $311.6 million. Next quarter’s revenue guidance of $335.4 million underwhelmed, coming in 14.3% below analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.22 per share was 32.5% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Monster Beverage achieves “record” quarterly net sales
summary: Hilton Schlosberg, CEO of Monster Beverage, said the company "achieved record net sales for the second quarter, exceeding the $2bn mark for the first time".
